member.name: T:WepApiProject.Controllers.WeatherForecastController
member.summary: This is the weather forecast controller that comes as a default from the project template when creating a new c# Web API application.

member.name: M:WepApiProject.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.Get
member.summary: This endpoint takes no arguments, and gives you the weather forecast
